Detailed Description

Header file with declarations for various LLVM utility stuff.

Definition in file llvmutil.h.

Function Documentation

void InitLLVMUtil ( llvm::LLVMContext *  ctx,
Target  target 
)

This should be called early in initialization to initialize the members of LLVMTypes and the LLVMTrue/LLVMFalse constants. However, it can't be called until the compilation target is known.

const llvm::ArrayType* LLVMPointerVectorType ( const llvm::Type *  t )

Given an LLVM type, returns the corresponding type for a vector of pointers to that type. (In practice, an array of pointers, since LLVM prohibits vectors of pointers.
